name: nextadmin-intl-theme-auth
description: NextJS Admin Dashboard ready to use

scripts.reset: rm -rf dist && rm -rf templates/base && mkdir -p templates/base && touch templates/base/.keep
scripts.build: pnpm run reset && pnpm run base && pnpm run patches && pnpm run intl && pnpm run themes && pnpm run auth && pnpm run dashboard && pnpm run debugauth && pnpm run debugdashboard

author: Danny Davila (@daikiejp)
